Technical Account Manager
Retool, Remote

Over the past year, our business has been expanding at breakneck speed and we‚Äôve been taking on more, and larger, customers. We‚Äôre looking to grow our post-sales team to partner closely with our strategic customers and help onboard them to the Retool platform. The ideal candidate for this role should be able to think about the growth strategy of an account and work with our customers through the technical details of deploying Retool at scale. You'll love this role if you have strong commercial instincts and enjoy engineering.

Technical Account Managers at Retool are pivotal in ensuring the technical success of our most strategic accounts. With a deep understanding of our product and a passion for problem-solving, TAMs work closely with our customers to ensure they get the most out of Retool. From onboarding to identifying new use cases, teaching best practices, and addressing technical challenges, TAMs are the go-to technical experts for our customers.

Who you'll work with:

As a TAM, you'll collaborate with a dedicated account team, including account executives, professional services, sales engineers, and support engineers. Together, you'll work to ensure that customers are healthy and receiving value from their investment in Retool.

What you'll do:

üü• Serve as the primary technical liaison for assigned key accounts and ensure they grow their usage of Retool and its impact on their business.
üü• Establish regular touchpoints to review customer usage, health, and expansion opportunities.
üü• Advocate for the needs of our customers within Retool, ensuring their feedback shapes our product evolution.
üü• Present technical content, such as sample apps, demos, and our product roadmap to diverse audiences, from engineers to C-suite executives.
üü• Organize hackathons and workshops to build developer mindshare and drive adoption at our accounts.
üü• Address technical challenges in Retool by providing solutions directly or coordinating with our product engineering teams.
üü• Identify and address barriers hindering customers from fully adopting Retool, using a mix of content, education, and training.
üü• Continuously evolve and improve customer engagement by contributing to our post-sales processes and resources.
üü• Contribute to the growth and development of the TAM team by participating in the hiring process.

The skillset you'll bring:

üîµ2+ years in a technical customer-facing role like Solutions Architect, Customer Success Engineer, or Implementation Consultant.
üîµAbility to navigate and solve open-ended technical challenges in dynamic environments.
üîµProven capability to address technical concerns and provide solutions in real-time customer discussions.
üîµExperience building applications with SQL, Javascript, and APIs.
üîµFamiliarity with both front-end and back-end development concepts.
üîµExceptional written and verbal communication skills.
üîµSpanish or French speaking is a plus.

Growth Data Analyst
Vivid, Remote/Limassol

Vivid is a dynamic fintech company dedicated to providing innovative solutions to enhance our users' financial experience. We are on a mission to identify and solve user problems, continuously improve our products, and introduce new features to make financial management simpler and more rewarding.

We recently launched our SME division, aiming to revolutionize how small and medium-sized enterprises grow and thrive in today's competitive landscape. We are seeking a highly motivated Growth Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about driving growth, adept at analyzing data, and skilled at identifying opportunities to scale acquisition channels, optimize costs, and explore new avenues for expansion. This role is instrumental in shaping the growth strategy of our SME division and ensuring its long-term success.

In this role, you will:

üü• Develop comprehensive dashboards and reports to track the effectiveness of different channels over time.
üü• Evaluate the cost-effectiveness of various acquisition channels and initiatives.
üü• Collaborate with team members to identify opportunities to scale high-performing acquisition channels.
üü• Research and evaluate emerging trends and technologies in the marketing and advertising landscape.
üü• Generate innovative ideas for new acquisition channels and tactics to reach target audiences.

Requirements

üîµProficiency in SQL.
üîµProven experience in a growth-focused role, preferably in a startup or high-growth environment.
üîµStrong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets and draw actionable insights.
üîµExcellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate findings and recommendations to stakeholders at all levels.
üîµTeam player with strong collaborative skills.

Would be a plus:

üîµ Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Mixpanel, or similar platforms.
üîµ Basic knowledge of Python and willingness to develop these skills.
Basic understanding of statistics and A/B testing

Benefits

üü¢This job is only for those who are outside of Russia (for remote work) or willing to relocate to Limassol or Almaty.
üü¢We support relocation (visa, package) when needed.
This is a middle/senior level position with a competitive salary and benefits package (depending on location).

Come and join our talented team of professionals and help us revolutionize the way people think about their money!
